title: Start of Impeachment Trial,  Sen. Marsha Blackburn
itunes:title: Start of Impeachment Trial,  Sen. Marsha Blackburn
description:
Panel Guests include Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media and Siraj Hashmi, conservative writer for the Washington Examiner.

Kevin also discussed the USMCA trade deal and the start of the impeachment trial against President Trump with Republican Tennessee Senator Marsha Blackburn.

Greta Van Susteren, Chief National Political Analyst and Host of Full Court Press with Greta Van Susteren called in to discuss her recent op-ed and the latest Democratic presidential debate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
